data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2 PB 1
data.actual_result: You will get an error "Failed to load the image. Please try again.". This problem only happens with unsecured links because uploading the same image to imgur (secured) and linking it will show it.
data.expected_result: You should see the image in the image preview.
data.short_description: Linked images with unsecured connection (http) can't be opened in image preview
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message with a linked image with unsecured connection (http)- Click on this image to open the image preview
